57#define AM_APOLLO3_PWRCTRL 1
58
59typedef enum
60{
61 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_NONE,
62 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOS,
63 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOM0,
64 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOM1,
65 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOM2,
66 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOM3,

74 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_PDM,
75 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_BLEL,
76 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_MAX
77} am_hal_pwrctrl_periph_e;
78
79typedef enum
80{
81 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_NONE,
82 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_8K_DTCM,
83 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_32K_DTCM,
84 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_64K_DTCM,
85 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_96K,
86 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_128K,
87 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_160K,
88 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_192K,
89 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_224K,
90 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_256K,
91 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_288K,
92 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_320K,
93 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_352K,
94 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_384K,
95 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_FLASH_512K,
96 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_FLASH_1M,
97 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_CACHE,
98 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_ALL,
99 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_MAX
100} am_hal_pwrctrl_mem_e;

108//*****************************************************************************
109//
110// Macros to check whether Apollo3 bucks are enabled.
111//
112//*****************************************************************************
113#define am_hal_pwrctrl_simobuck_enabled_check() \
114 (PWRCTRL->SUPPLYSTATUS_b.SIMOBUCKON)
115
116#define am_hal_pwrctrl_blebuck_enabled_check() \
117 (PWRCTRL->SUPPLYSTATUS_b.BLEBUCKON)
